- Expands White's space advantage and controls key squares (c5, d5, e5, f5)
- Opens diagonals for the queen and light-squared bishop
- Prepares for rapid development of the queenside
  
Black's ...a5-a4 has weakened their queenside without challenging the center—this is an opportunity to solidify our positional advantage.
